name: Hobgoblin Weapon Discipline
summary: You know how to efficiently utilize the weapons soldiers use in close quarters.
description:
You know how to efficiently utilize the weapons soldiers use in close quarters. Whenever you score a critical hit using a weapon of the polearm, spear, or sword group, you apply the weaponâ€™s critical specialization effect.Traits

Hobgoblin: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order
